io.github.dranreb22

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.dranreb22.Product
      • io.github.dranreb22.AudioPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item, MultimediaControl

    public class AudioPlayer
extends Product
implements MultimediaControl
    Class AudioPlayer extends Product and is meant to serve as a type of product to be created based on ItemTypes chosen.
    Author:
    Bernard Georges 9/26/2019

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioPlayer

        public AudioPlayer(java.lang.Integer id,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String manufacturer,
                   ItemType audioType,
                   java.lang.String supportedAudioFormats,
                   java.lang.String supportedPlaylistFormats)
        Constructor method for class AudioPlayer, enabling users to pass defined parameters below.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the audio player.
        manufacturer - Manufacturer of the audio player.
        audioType - ItemType (will always be AUDIO).
        supportedAudioFormats - the formats of audio that the player supports.
        supportedPlaylistFormats - the format of the playlists that the player supports.
